title_narrative: GIHCD - Geneva Center for Hum Demining 2013 2014
GIHCD - Geneva Center for Hum Demining 2013 2014
sector_narrative: Removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war
description_narrative: Geneva International Center for Humanitarian Demining äe en ledande   organisation inom minhantering, för teknisk kapacitetsutveckling och  utveckling av tekniska lösningar. Sida stödjer GICHD med ett          programstöd.

Geneva International Center for Humanitarian Demining is a leading    mine action organisation for technical assistance and                 method/techincal development. Sida supports GICHD with progam         support.
result_description_narrative: General question: Results related to the intended outcome 2014Question: Summarise results related to the intended outcome (this information will be sent to Open Aid)Answer: The Operational Support Mine Action programme that Sida has been funding during 2013-2014 through GICHD's Operations Consulting Division has contributed to strengthening capacity of national mine action programmes. It has also contributed to accelerating the progress of clearance operations to improve human security and facilitate development in Mine/ERW (Explosive Remnants of War) contaminated countries. Enhanced knowledge and safety for civilians has been achieved concerning work on Ammunity Safety Management procedures.
result_indicator_description_narrative: No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
